mapper.insert: insert into shopping(user_id, product_id, count) VALUES (#{user_id},#{product_id},#{count})
mapper.update: update shopping set count=#{count} where user_id=#{user_id} and product_id=#{product_id}
mapper.delete: delete from shopping where product_id=#{product_id} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select `count` from shopping where user_id=#{user_id} and product_id=#{product_id}
select user_id, product_id, count from shopping where user_id=#{user_id}
select product_id, name, price, old_price, info, count, type_id, state, isdel, createtime, creator, lastedittime from product where product_id=#{product_id}
